entry.title: What is Synthetic Identity Theft and How to Protect Yourself
entry.summary: In today‚Äôs digital age, cybercriminals have no shortage of methods to steal people's identities and sensitive data. One such method is synthetic identity theft, which is becoming one of the most dangerous and common forms. In fact, according to a figures published by Federal Reserve Bank of Boston [https://www.bostonfed.org/news-and-events/news/2022/08/synthetic-identity-fraud-is-not-a-victimless-crime-costs-billions-damages-lives.aspx]

entry.title: Learn CSS by Building the React Logo in Pure CSS
entry.summary: One of the best ways to learn CSS is by creating something useful while you learn. I will show you how to use the following CSS concepts by creating the React logo: * position: absolute * vw (view width) * transform: rotate() * animation using keyframes
